entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 40 km/h gusting to 60 after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 22 January 2023
